name: ARMADIL-THROW!
description:
FULL SCREEN is recommended until we fix the scaling!

Complete stages by throwing around a little armadillo ball!

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2!

  • WASD to Move
  • Hold LMB to Wind Up 
  • Hold RMB to Throw (unlocked at the third level)

We're planning on adding AUDIO, more LEVELS and general polish as soon as possible.

Programming by Lars Werther (@OldBlackTrain)

Art by Wessel Freriks (@SuggoCreations)
